title: Far Eastern fruit salad
ingredients: ['1 can lychees in syrup, about 425 g', '3 pieces stem ginger, cut into fine strips, plus 2 tbsp syrup from the jar', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lime', '2 oranges', '200 g (7 oz) black grapes, halved and seeded', '1 red-skinned dessert apple, cored and chopped', 'fine shreds of lime zest to decorate']
